refnamediv.refpurpose: Maintains the output equal to the highest absolute value received.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These opcodes maintain the output k-rate variable as the peak absolute level so far received.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kres -- Output equal to the highest absolute value received so far. This is effectively an input to the opcode as well, since it reads kres in order to decide whether to write something higher into it.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
